text: Prikro is a town in east-central Ivory Coast. It is a sub-prefecture of and the seat of Prikro Department in Iffou Region, Lacs District. Prikro is also a commune. Bouaké is 50 kilometres to the west. In 2014, the population of the sub-prefecture of Prikro was 33,242. ==Villages== The 25 villages of the sub- prefecture of Prikro and their population in 2014 are: ==References== Category:Sub-prefectures of Iffou Category:Communes of Iffou
title: Prikro
